item.title: All About the Show

item.title: 2021 Halloween Light Show
item.description: Halloween 2021 was our first big light show.

item.title: The Rules
item.description: We hope everyone enjoys the show. We also want to keep providing this bit of entertainment around the holidays. For that reason, we ask that everyone who stops by to please be safe and considerate of our neighbors.
